pages.text: To store your freshly reaped essence on the go, you need to construct an essence container. Upgrades are also available if more capacity is desired.$(br2)Experienced reapers keep several for both essence types!
The most basic container available. You'll need to shape it with pure soumberglass.
You can upgrade the basic essence keeper into a more advanced variant. The ender pearl gives the keeper a more green color.
Finally, you can upgrade the more advanced essence keeper into an essence vessel. Spend those ender pearls wisely!
